body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Apple Clang 12.0.0.

Also finds the external package correctly:
```yaml
  meson:
    externals:
    - spec: meson@0.56.0
      prefix: /Users/Adam/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/apple-clang-12.0.0/meson-0.56.0-cbq23hnkpssutxc6vsg4pxxaywt3pndy
```
title: meson: add new version, external find support
